markdownRemark.html:
Dr. Mohammad Saleh completed his residency in internal medicine then fellowship in endocrinology, metabolism and geriatric at Wayne State University in Detroit, Michigan. Dr. Saleh is American Board certified in Endocrinology and Metabolism. Dr. Saleh is also a fellow of the American College of Endocrinology.

Dr. Saleh is a consulting attending physician at Beaumont Dearborn Hospital and is the author of several articles in medical journals in the field of Endocrinology and Diabetes Mellitus

frontmatter.title: Dr. Mohammad Saleh, MD. FACE
